text: "Loverboy" is a 2001 song by Mariah Carey featuring Cameo and was the leading single from her eighth studio album Glitter and from the 2001 movie Glitter. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 12 in the United Kingdom, number 50 in South Africa and Ireland, number 1 in Croatia, number 7 in Australia, number 3 in Canada, number 23 in Scotland and number 13 in Italy. == Formats and track listings == Australian CD single # "Loverboy" (featuring Cameo) # "Loverboy" (Remix featuring Da Brat and Ludacris) # "Loverboy" (Club of Love Remix) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole Remix) # "Loverboy" (Dub of Love Remix) Australian promo CD single # "Loverboy" (featuring Cameo) # "Loverboy" (David Morales Club of Love Mix) # "Loverboy" (Remix featuring Da Brat and Ludacris) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole Main Mix Radio Edit) # "Loverboy" (David Morales Drums Of Love Mix) Japanese CD single # "Loverboy" (featuring Cameo) # "Loverboy" (Remix featuring Da Brat and Ludacris) European CD maxi-single # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole Remix) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole Radio Edit) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole London Dub Mix) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole Instrumental) # "Loverboy" (Club of Love Remix) # "Loverboy" (Club of Love Radio Edit) # "Loverboy" (Dreamy Club of Love Radio Edit) # "Loverboy" (Dub of Love Remix) # "Loverboy" (Drums of Love) European CD single # "Loverboy" (featuring Cameo) # "Loverboy" (Remix featuring Da Brat and Ludacris) UK 12-inch vinyl single # "Loverboy" (Drums of Love) # "Loverboy" (Dub of Love Remix) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole London Dub Mix) UK promo maxi-single # "Loverboy" (featuring Cameo) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole Remix) # "Loverboy" (Club of Love Remix) US CD maxi-single # "Loverboy" (featuring Cameo) # "Loverboy" (Remix featuring Da Brat and Ludacris) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole Remix) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole Instrumental) # "Loverboy" (MJ Cole London Dub Mix) # "Loverboy" (Club of Love Remix) # "Loverboy" (Dub of Love Remix) # "Loverboy" (Drums of Love) Japanese Limited Edition 2020 Cassette Single # "Here We Go Around Again" # "Loverboy" (Firecracker â€“ Original Version) ==References== Category:2001 songs Category:Mariah Carey songs Category:Ludacris songs
